request

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • request.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Request class has information of client input such as, request method, http version, request header, and body contents.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Younjin Hwang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request(HttpVerb httpVerb, java.lang.String resourcePath, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers, java.lang.String bodyContent)
      This Constructor set httpVerb, resourcePath, headers, and body Contents.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBodyContent()
      Returns http request body content.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getHeaders()
      Returns http request headers as a map.
      HttpVerb getHttpVerb()
      Returns http method of request.
      java.lang.String getRequestLine()
      Returns information of request as a String with CRLF.
      java.lang.String getResourcePath()
      Returns resource location of request.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(HttpVerb httpVerb,
               java.lang.String resourcePath,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
               java.lang.String bodyContent)
        This Constructor set httpVerb, resourcePath, headers, and body Contents. Http Version is HTTP/1.1 for default.
        Parameters:
        httpVerb - method of request
        resourcePath - location of resource
        headers - http request headers
        bodyContent - body content of http request
        Since:
        1.0
